## Validate.isValidQualifierContextValue() function

Determines whether a string is a valid qualifier context value. For now, any non-empty string is considered a valid context value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isValidQualifierContextValue(value: string): value is QualifierContextValue;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

value


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

the string to validate


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

value is [QualifierContextValue](./ts-res.qualifiercontextvalue.md)

true if the string is a valid qualifier context value, false otherwise.
